name: Oneesama
tagline: Experimental Android client for Dynasty Reader
body:
### Download APK
[Oneesama 0.1.0 (Beta 5)](https://github.com/DefiantCatgirl/Oneesama/releases/download/v0.1.0-beta.5/Oneesama.apk)


![Oneesama QR](http://i.imgur.com/IqidJnh.png)

### Downloading chapters
To read chapters in the app open Dynasty Reader in your mobile browser - when you select a chapter on the site the app will intercept the intent and download the chapter. 

This may not work in some Android browsers, use the âŠ• button on the toolbar to manually paste a chapter URL.

Gingerbread at your own risk, will likely burn and crash.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
